metadata.title: CVE-2020-1739 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible 2.7.16 and prior, 2.8.8 and prior, and 2.9.5and prior when a password is set with the argument "password" of svnmodule, it is used on svn command line, disclosing to other users withinthe same node. An attacker could take advantage by reading the cmdline filefrom that particular PID on the procfs.

criterions.comment: ansible package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
